backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining note/file types, paywall state, access control, and admin/user functions for managing paywall status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping deployment-related features to files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing each major frontend file and its functionality.
frontend/deploy-logs/.gitkeep: Empty file ensuring the deploy-logs directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_IC.md: Mainnet deployment guide with prerequisites, quick-start steps, and instructions for running the deployment script.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS global styles defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the frontend app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic.sh: Mainnet deployment script handling preflight checks, build, canister creation, installation, logging, and error troubleshooting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, actor initialization, profile loading, and conditional rendering of vault UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied screen prompting the user to authenticate with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/Initializat: Shows an initialization failure message with error details and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for entering and saving a user's display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBann: Reusable banner component for displaying error titles and messages.
frontend/src/components/files/FileDetail: Panel for viewing, editing metadata, downloading, and deleting an individual file.
frontend/src/components/files/FilePrevie: Displays decrypted previews for supported file types and allows editing, downloading, and deleting.
frontend/src/components/files/FilesListP: Lists all files with ownership badges and allows selecting a file for viewing.
frontend/src/components/files/FileUpload: Card for encrypted file upload with drag‑and‑drop support, progress tracking, and storage-access gating.
frontend/src/components/layout/VaultLayo: Main vault layout managing tabs, note/file panels, paywall states, and an admin access-list view.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteDetail: Displays and edits a selected note with client-side encryption, saving, deletion, and sharing features.
frontend/src/components/notes/NotesListP: Lists user notes, shows sharing status, and provides a dialog to create encrypted notes if storage access is enabled.
frontend/src/components/paywall/PaywallP: Shows paywall restrictions, plan details, and expiration when storage access is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/settings/AdminPa: Admin screen listing all paywall states with options to revoke access and copy principals.
frontend/src/components/settings/Encrypt: Toggle component enabling or disabling client-side encryption with descriptive status messaging.
frontend/src/components/settings/Paywall: UI panel showing the caller’s paywall status and, if admin, controls to grant or revoke paywall access for other principals.
frontend/src/components/sharing/ShareMan: Dialog for sharing an item with other principals, allowing adding or revoking access via provided mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/encryption/useEncrypt: Hook managing user-specific encryption settings and providing content and file encrypt/decrypt helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentIdentity.ts: Hook exposing the authenticated principal, identity object, and a logout function that clears cached data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, paywall status, admin paywall state, and access mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated backend actor with timeout protection and returning its load state and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/crypto/vaultCrypto.ts: Implements AES‑GCM key generation, encryption, and decryption utilities for text and file bytes with base64 helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/async.ts: Provides a utility to wrap promises with a timeout using Promise.race.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Detects file preview types, resolves MIME types, and checks browser video playback capability.
frontend/src/utils/paywall.ts: Utilities for evaluating paywall status, formatting expiration dates, and converting storage sizes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors bound to CSS variables, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the secure vault app.
